Name: The Neontalon Roc
Description: A creature born of gas and light, buoyed by electric life. From a distance, a beauty of the modern urban. From up close? A flashing death.
Mechanics: The first hit each turn knocks the Roc out of the sky, giving everyone else a +2 to hit bonus until the end of the round.
BasicAction:
First action is always to Neon Burst. If out of melee, or in a terrain effect, will Step to the closest safe position adjacent to a Warlock. Will Stride if a Step is not enough. Uses remaining actions on Whirling Talon.

**Step**: 2 Squares
**Stride**: 8 Squares

**Neon Burst**: 1 Action. Targets all enemies within 6 squares, and in Line of Sight. Suffer 9 Hollow.
**Whirling Talon**: 1 Action. Targets the weakest adjacent enemy. 10 Slashing.
AttackCards: Flashbang Feathers | All enemies within 3 of me suffer 10 Hollow Damage.
Blazing Bombs | Target two enemies with the most characters adjacent to them. Strike everyone in a 3x3 centered on those targets for 10 Burn Damage.
Wailing Whirlwind | All enemies outside of 4 of me suffer 10 Slash Damage.
Piercing Plumage | All enemies who are not adjacent to another Character suffer 10 Pierce Damage
Blinding Blaze | Increase Neon Burst's damage by 2 this Round.
